trans-unit.source: Defines the invoking designer and message filters properties and the method that determines whether an activity is supported for all workflow root designers.
trans-unit.target: Define o designer de invocação e propriedades de filtros de mensagem e o método que determina se uma atividade tem suporte para todos os designers de raiz de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All workflow root designers are either of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> or inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Todos os designers de raiz de fluxo de trabalho são do tipo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>ou herdar a partir dele.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> que solicitou o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: If the current activity designer is the child of another activity designer, the parent designer is often also the invoking designer.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer de atividade atual é o filho de outro designer de atividade, o designer de pai geralmente também é o designer de invocação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> que solicitou o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported on the current workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o tipo especificado tem suporte no designer de fluxo de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to check for support on the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para verificar se há suporte no designer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: if type is supported on the current workflow designer; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se type com suporte no designer de fluxo de trabalho atual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets any message filters associated with the workflow root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os filtros de mensagem associados com o designer de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: A WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter read-only collection that contains any message filters associated with the workflow root designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter coleção somente leitura que contém qualquer filtro de mensagem associado com o designer de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether the actual workflow root designer supports the layout persistence.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que indica se o designer de fluxo de trabalho real raiz oferece suporte a persistência de layout.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the designer supports layout persistence; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o designer oferece suporte à conservação de layout; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
